text: Melinda May is a Marvel Comics character that originated from the Marvel Cinematic Universe. She is an agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. ==Biography== Melinda May has encountered an Inhuman at Bahrain and protected her. She was known as "The Cavalry" since then. She retired from the field until she was convinced by a resurrected Phil Coulson to return back to S.H.I.E.L.D. ==In other media == Ming-Na Wen has played May in all her appearances in the MCU and other media. Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2013 Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe characters Category:Television characters
title: Melinda May
